cocktails.name: Martini
cocktails.ingredients: Gin: 2 1/2 oz, Dry Vermouth: 1/2 oz
cocktails.instructions: Stir gin and dry vermouth with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or olive.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.ingredients: Tequila: 2 oz, Lime Juice: 1 oz, Triple Sec: 1/2 oz
cocktails.instructions: Shake tequila, lime juice, and triple sec with ice, then strain into a glass over ice. Optionally, rim the glass with salt. Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.ingredients: Bourbon or Rye Whiskey: 2 oz, Sugar Cube: 1, Angostura Bitters: 2-3 dashes
cocktails.instructions: Muddle sugar cube with bitters in a glass, then add bourbon or rye whiskey and ice. Stir until well chilled. Garnish with an orange twist and/or cherry.

cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.ingredients: White Rum: 2 oz, Lime Juice: 1/2 oz, Simple Syrup: 1/2 oz, Fresh Mint Leaves: 6-8, Soda Water: To top
cocktails.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with lime juice and simple syrup in a glass. Add white rum and ice, then top with soda water. Stir gently and garnish with a mint sprig and lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.ingredients: Gin: 1 oz, Campari: 1 oz, Sweet Vermouth: 1 oz
cocktails.instructions: Stir gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth with ice, then strain into a glass over ice. Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.ingredients: Vodka: 1 1/2 oz, Cranberry Juice: 1 oz, Triple Sec: 1/2 oz, Lime Juice: 1/2 oz
cocktails.instructions: Shake vodka, cranberry juice, triple sec, and lime juice with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.ingredients: White Rum: 2 oz, Lime Juice: 3/4 oz, Simple Syrup: 1/2 oz
cocktails.instructions: Shake white rum, lime juice, and simple syrup with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Piña Colada
cocktails.ingredients: White Rum: 2 oz, Pineapple Juice: 3 oz, Coconut Cream: 1 oz
cocktails.instructions: Blend white rum, pineapple juice, and coconut cream with crushed ice until smooth. Pour into a glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge and cherry.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.ingredients: Bourbon or Rye Whiskey: 2 oz, Lemon Juice: 3/4 oz, Simple Syrup: 1/2 oz
cocktails.instructions: Shake bourbon or rye whiskey, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice, then strain into a glass over ice. Garnish with a lemon wheel and cherry.

cocktails.name: Caipirinha
cocktails.ingredients: Cachaça: 2 oz, Lime: 1/2, Sugar: 2 teaspoons
cocktails.instructions: Muddle lime wedges with sugar in a glass, then add cachaça and ice. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Gin and Tonic
cocktails.ingredients: Gin: 2 oz, Tonic Water: 4 oz
cocktails.instructions: Pour gin and tonic water into a glass over ice. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge or cucumber slice.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.ingredients: Bourbon or Rye Whiskey: 2 oz, Sweet Vermouth: 1 oz, Angostura Bitters: 2 dashes
cocktails.instructions: Stir bourbon or rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
cocktails.ingredients: Vodka: 2 oz, Ginger Beer: 4 oz, Lime Juice: 1/2 oz
cocktails.instructions: Pour vodka and lime juice into a glass filled with ice. Top with ginger beer and stir gently. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.ingredients: Vodka: 1 1/2 oz, Tomato Juice: 3 oz, Lemon Juice: 1/2 oz, Worcestershire Sauce: 2 dashes, Tabasco Sauce: 2 dashes
cocktails.instructions: Build vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and Tabasco sauce in a glass over ice. Stir well and garnish with a celery stalk, lemon wedge, and olive.

cocktails.name: Singapore Sling
cocktails.ingredients: Gin: 1 1/2 oz, Cherry Liqueur: 1/2 oz, Cointreau: 1/4 oz, Benedictine: 1/4 oz, Grenadine: 1/2 oz, Pineapple Juice: 2 oz, Lime Juice: 3/4 oz, Angostura Bitters: 2 dashes, Soda Water: To top
cocktails.instructions: Shake gin, cherry liqueur, Cointreau, Benedictine, grenadine, lime juice, and bitters with ice, then strain into a glass over ice. Top with soda water and garnish with a pineapple slice and cherry.

cocktails.name: Virgin Mojito
cocktails.ingredients: Lime Juice: 1 oz, Simple Syrup: 3/4 oz, Mint Leaves: 6-8, Soda Water: To top
cocktails.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with lime juice and simple syrup in a glass. Add ice and top with soda water. Stir gently and garnish with a mint sprig and lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Virgin Pina Colada
cocktails.ingredients: Pineapple Juice: 3 oz, Coconut Cream: 3 oz, Pineapple chunks: 1/4 cup, Crushed Ice: 1 cup
cocktails.instructions: Blend pineapple juice, coconut cream, pineapple chunks, and crushed ice until smooth. Pour into a glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge and cherry.

cocktails.name: Shirley Temple
cocktails.ingredients: Ginger Ale: 6 oz, Grenadine: 1/2 oz, Maraschino Cherry: 1
cocktails.instructions: Pour ginger ale and grenadine into a glass over ice. Stir gently and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Virgin Mary
cocktails.ingredients: Tomato Juice: 5 oz, Lemon Juice: 1/2 oz, Worcestershire Sauce: 2 dashes, Tabasco Sauce: 2 dashes, Salt: Pinch, Black Pepper: Pinch
cocktails.instructions: Build tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco sauce, salt, and black pepper in a glass over ice. Stir well and garnish with a celery stalk, lemon wedge, and olive.

cocktails.name: Non-Alcoholic Sangria
cocktails.garnish: Orange slice, Lemon slice, Apple slice, Cinnamon stick
cocktails.ingredients: Red Grape Juice: 2 cups, Orange Juice: 1 cup, Lemon Juice: 1/4 cup, Apple Juice: 1/4 cup, Orange: 1, Lemon: 1, Apple: 1, Cinnamon Sticks: 2-3
cocktails.instructions: Mix red grape juice, orange juice, lemon juice, apple juice, orange slices, lemon slices, apple slices, and cinnamon sticks in a pitcher. Chill for at least an hour before serving.

cocktails.name: Fruit Punch
cocktails.garnish: Orange slice, Lemon slice, Maraschino Cherry
cocktails.ingredients: Orange Juice: 2 cups, Pineapple Juice: 1 cup, Cranberry Juice: 1 cup, Lemon Juice: 1/4 cup, Simple Syrup: 1/4 cup, Maraschino Cherry: 6-8, Orange: 1, Lemon: 1
cocktails.instructions: Mix orange juice, pineapple juice, cranberry juice, lemon juice, simple syrup, and maraschino cherries in a pitcher. Add orange slices and lemon slices. Chill before serving.

cocktails.name: Watermelon Lemonade
cocktails.garnish: Watermelon wedge, Lemon slice, Mint leaves
cocktails.ingredients: Watermelon Juice: 2 cups, Lemon Juice: 1 cup, Sugar: 1/2 cup, Water: 2 cups, Lemon: 1, Watermelon Wedges: For garnish, Mint Leaves: For garnish
cocktails.instructions: Blend watermelon juice, lemon juice, sugar, and water until smooth. Serve over ice and garnish with watermelon wedges and mint leaves.

cocktails.name: Cucumber Cooler
cocktails.ingredients: Cucumber Juice: 2 cups, Lime Juice: 1/4 cup, Simple Syrup: 1/4 cup, Soda Water: 2 cups, Cucumber slices: For garnish, Lime wedges: For garnish
cocktails.instructions: Mix cucumber juice, lime juice, simple syrup, and soda water in a pitcher. Serve over ice and garnish with cucumber slices and lime wedges.

cocktails.name: Arnold Palmer
cocktails.ingredients: Iced Tea: 1 1/2 cups, Lemonade: 1 1/2 cups, Lemon slices: For garnish, Mint sprigs: For garnish
cocktails.instructions: Mix iced tea and lemonade in a pitcher. Serve over ice and garnish with lemon slices and mint sprigs.

cocktails.name: Virgin Lemonade
cocktails.ingredients: Lemon Juice: 1 oz, Simple Syrup: 3/4 oz, Water: 6 oz, Ice: To serve
cocktails.instructions: Mix lemon juice, simple syrup, and water in a pitcher. Serve over ice and garnish with a lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Strawberry Lemonade
cocktails.ingredients: Lemon Juice: 1 oz, Strawberry Puree: 1 oz, Simple Syrup: 3/4 oz, Water: 6 oz, Ice: To serve
cocktails.instructions: Mix lemon juice, strawberry puree, simple syrup, and water in a pitcher. Serve over ice and garnish with a strawberry and lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Italian Soda
cocktails.ingredients: Club Soda: 6 oz, Flavored Syrup: 2 oz, Half-and-Half: 1 oz
cocktails.instructions: Mix club soda, flavored syrup, and half-and-half in a glass over ice. Stir gently.

cocktails.name: Berry Smoothie
cocktails.ingredients: Mixed Berries: 1 cup, Banana: 1, Yogurt: 1/2 cup, Milk: 1/2 cup, Honey: 1-2 tablespoons
cocktails.instructions: Blend mixed berries, banana, yogurt, milk, and honey until smooth. Serve immediately and garnish with mixed berries.

cocktails.name: Virgin Strawberry Daiquiri
cocktails.ingredients: Strawberries: 1 1/2 cups, Lime Juice: 1/4 cup, Simple Syrup: 1/4 cup, Ice: 2 cups
cocktails.instructions: Blend strawberries, lime juice, simple syrup, and ice until smooth. Serve immediately and garnish with a strawberry.

cocktails.name: Coconut Watermelon Cooler
cocktails.ingredients: Watermelon Juice: 2 cups, Coconut Water: 1 cup, Lime Juice: 1/4 cup, Simple Syrup: 1/4 cup, Ice: 2 cups, Watermelon Slices: For garnish, Mint Sprigs: For garnish
cocktails.instructions: Blend watermelon juice, coconut water, lime juice, simple syrup, and ice until smooth. Serve immediately and garnish with watermelon slice and mint sprig.
